osvSchema.details: Memory Corruption in Core while invoking a call to Access Control core library with hardware protected address range.

description_data.value: Memory Corruption in Core while invoking a call to Access Control core library with hardware protected address range.

descriptions.value: Memory Corruption in Core while invoking a call to Access Control core library with hardware protected address range.
Corrupción de la memoria en el núcleo al invocar una llamada a la librería central de control de acceso con un rango de direcciones protegido por hardware.
